title: BUG REPORT: DRAGON BUFF
body: I've noticed with the dragon buffs, the second stage tooltip says tower damage and the fourth is minion and monster damage, but when you kill the dragons the text on your champion say +pushing power on 2nd and +tower destruction on the 4th

replies.body:
This is a known bug, I believe which was fixed in Patch 5.1.

If you're certain that it's still occuring, get screens and go over to the [bug reporting boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report).
Could you please provide a screen shot of this, Cheers.
